contest-event.event-date:
May 8, 2021 D European Championships (online voting)
European Championships 10 Set Test and Own Choice European Championships european-championships
(online) > special EBBA-Weekend, available on https://wobplay.com/ >Online Voting - Audience can vote from a pre-selection their best Set Work and the Own Choice (highlights from the event since 2003) The European Brass Band Association has joined forces with World of Brass to present a free special online European Brass Band Festival next month. Hosted by Frank Renton and Helen Varley, it will be broadcast from Friday 7th May to Sunday 9th May.
Again cancelled due to the COVID-19 Pandemic. Was planned to happen in Malmö, Sweden.
Oct. 14, 2019, 1:58 p.m. May 2, 2021, 8:16 p.m.
